title: Night Heist 2017
description:
Join the Evening Associates Board for the seventh annual Night Heist benefit, the event of the year for young art-loving Chicagoans.

Experience the extraordinary at an evening inspired by the blockbuster summer exhibition Gauguin: Artist as Alchemist. Night Heist guests will enjoy exclusive after-hours access to this exhibition which celebrates the expansive career of Gauguin as he created work that defied definition. The evening also includes live music, entertainment, themed cocktails from Chicago's top mixologists, hors d’oeuvres, and a raffle with coveted prizes. Proceeds from this event support the Evening Associates' mission to support exhibitions at the Art Institute devoted to today's emerging artists.

With VIP tickets, your evening also includes an elegant reception in the museum's South Garden, a presentation by the exhibition curator, and exhibition access beginning at 7:30. VIP tickets are SOLD OUT.

Access the mobile-friendly evening program.

Official after party at Boleo

Event co-chairs: Caitlynde Brancovsky and Antoine Jennings.

This event is 21+.

Night Heist proceeds benefit the museum and your contribution is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by the law. All tickets are nonrefundable.

*Limited to four per person in accordance with Illinois law
